module.title: Resource: Shop Bridge
module.description: Abstraction layer for different shop article types.
module.log: Extend database model by controller classes.
Extend database model by URI paths and title.
Add strict mode for article check.
Extend bridge logic for quantity changes.
module.author: Christian Würker
module.sql: DROP TABLE IF EXISTS `<%?prefix%>shop_bridges`; CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `<%?prefix%>shop_bridges` ( `bridgeId` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `title` varchar(50) COLLATE utf8_unicode_ci NOT NULL, `class` varchar(64) COLLATE utf8_unicode_ci NOT NULL, `frontendController` varchar(50) COLLATE utf8_unicode_ci NOT NULL, `frontendUriPath` varchar(50) COLLATE utf8_unicode_ci NOT NULL, `backendController` varchar(50) COLLATE utf8_unicode_ci DEFAULT NULL, `backendUriPath` varchar(50) COLLATE utf8_unicode_ci DEFAULT NULL, `createdAt` decimal(12,0) unsigned NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`bridgeId`), KEY `class` (`class`), KEY `frontendController` (`frontendController`), KEY `backendController` (`backendController`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8 COLLATE=utf8_unicode_ci;

ALTER TABLE `<%?prefix%>shop_bridges` ADD `articleTableName` VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL AFTER `backendUriPath`; ALTER TABLE `<%?prefix%>shop_bridges` ADD `articleIdColumn` VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL AFTER `articleTableName`;
